name: Chang the Ninth
description:
After either side uses a Skill: If Physical DMG or Piercing DMG was dealt, or an Elemental Reaction was triggered, this card gains 1 Inspiration.
When this card gains 3 Inspiration, then discard this card and draw 2 cards.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After either side uses a Skill:</color> If $[K100] or $[K5] was dealt, or an <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Reaction</color> was triggered, this card gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Inspiration</color>.\nWhen this card gains 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Inspiration</color>, then discard this card and draw 2 cards.
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After either side uses a Skill:</color> If {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> was dealt, or an <color=#FFFFFFFF>Elemental Reaction</color> was triggered, this card gains 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Inspiration</color>.\nWhen this card gains 3 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Inspiration</color>, then discard this card and draw 2 cards.
storytext: "He who has not known poverty has yet to become a true man, and at least this man has books to keep him company!"
